import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Results() { const [students, setStudents] = useState([]) const [selected, setSelected] = useState(false) const [selectedStudent, setSelectedStudent] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetchStudents() }, []) const fetchStudents = async () => { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:4000/students') setStudents(response.data) console.log(response.data) } return (
